DescriptionData.Title: Fiskars Designer Scissors and Rotary Cutter - Zebra
DescriptionData.Description: Each pack contains one pair of 8in Fiskars scissors in a zebra pattern and one coordinating stick rotary cutter_for effortless long clean cutting action. Will cut through denim, polyester and most other fabrics._

DescriptionData.Title: Fiskars Designer Scissors and Rotary Cutter - Cheetah
DescriptionData.Description: Each pack contains one pair of 8in Fiskars scissors in a cheetah pattern and one coordinating stick rotary cutter_for effortless long clean cutting action. Will cut through denim, polyester and most other fabrics._

DescriptionData.Title: Overlocker/ Serger Cone Thread Tray
DescriptionData.Description:
Keep your threads in order with this super helpful organiser. It has a sturdy base with easy to insert "prongs" holds a minimum of 25 cones or up to 50 spools if they are half height.
Dimensions 12-1/5in x 12-1/2in x ~3/4in.

DescriptionData.Title: Creative Colour Wheel
DescriptionData.Description: A tool for designers in all artistic mediums to help create coloor combinations to compliment and tone and to assist in the understanding of colour relationships. This is a two-sided rotating wheel showing relationships between colours.

DescriptionData.Title: OLFA Rotary Cutter 28mm
DescriptionData.Description: OLFA Cutter Heavy Duty The Original Cutting Tools Best Cutting Tools in the World Easily Identifiable colour - Yellow

DescriptionData.Title: OLFA Rotary Cutter 60mm
DescriptionData.Description: OLFA Cutter Heavy Duty The Original Cutting Tools Best Cutting Tools in the World Easily Identifiable colour - Yellow

DescriptionData.Title: Madeira Applique Scissors 6'
DescriptionData.Description: Specialist scissors for applique from Maderia. Makes cutting close to the die line very easy.

DescriptionData.Title: Sew Simple Replacement Blade 45mm
DescriptionData.Description: A Sew Simple Rotary Cutter Replacement Blade for a 45mm rotary cutter, compatible with Sew Simple, Olfa and other 45mm rotary cutters.

DescriptionData.Title: Sew Simple Replacement Blade 28mm 2 Pack
DescriptionData.Description: A 2 pack of Sew Simple Rotary Cutter Replacement Blade for a 28mm rotary cutter, compatible with Sew Simple, Olfa and other 28mm rotary cutters.

DescriptionData.Title: Sew Simple Replacement Blade 60mm
DescriptionData.Description: A Sew Simple Rotary Cutter Replacement Blade for a 60mm rotary cutter, compatible with Sew Simple, Olfa and other 60mm rotary cutters.

DescriptionData.Title: Sew Simple 45mm Rotary Cutter Soft Grip
DescriptionData.Description: Sew Simple rotary cutter, with a 45 mm circular blade Heavy duty, professional cutting tool. Great quality rotary cutter with a soft grip handle.

DescriptionData.Title: TrueCut My Comfort Rotary Cutter 60mm
DescriptionData.Description: Ergonomically tested rotary cutter. Eliminates stress in wrist and arm Combined with the TrueCut Ruler Track it gives a precise cut every time. the cutter. Suitable for left and right handed users

DescriptionData.Title: Fiskars Thread Snips
DescriptionData.Description:
Spring loaded clip & Micro-Tip blades
Ideal for unpicking stitches, trimming loose threads and seam allowances
Suitable for left and right handed use
Dimensions (LxWxD):5x1x12.5cm

DescriptionData.Title: Fiskars Scissor Sharpener
DescriptionData.Description: Fiskars Scossor sharpener. Quick and very simple to use. Keep all your scissor blades clean and sharp.

DescriptionData.Title: Fiskars Dressmaking Scissors 25cm
DescriptionData.Description: Right handed scissors from Fiskars with long sharp blades and shaped-handle for effortless long clean cutting action. Will cut through denim, polyester and most other fabrics.

DescriptionData.Title: Omnigrid 5 Slot Wooden Ruler Rack
DescriptionData.Description:
Keeps rulers handy, organised and your workspace clear. This quality wooden rack has five horizontal slots to store rulers upright and keep them visible. Non- skid plastic discs on bottom prevents rack from moving or slipping.
20in L x 4in W x 3/4in Thick
